title: God of War Ragnarok’s Gone Gold, Kojima Tease Confirmed! - Kinda Funny Games Daily LIVE 10.07.22
description:
Learn more about the NZXT FHD Canvas Gaming Monitors at  https://nzxt.co/KFGFHD

Start your credit journey with Chime at at http://chime.com/kfgames

God of War Ragnarok's gone gold, Elle Fanning's been confirmed for Kojima's next game, and EA launching a new PC platform.

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:02:46 - Housekeeping
There’s a new PS I Love You XOXO all about PlayStation Stars and what we’d do to fix it
It’s FINALLY happening: Friday the 14th, we’re moving into the Spare Bedroom
The Roper Report   -
00:03:55 - God of War has gone GOLD
00:14:33 - Crash Bandicoot Announcement at Game Awards?!
00:20:27 - Hideo Kojima’s Next Game Casts Elle Fanning, as Confirmed by QR Code
00:28:58 - EA is launching a new Launcher
00:32:48 - The next Splatfest has been revealed
00:42:11 - No Man's Sky: Waypoint Update Is the Game's 'Biggest Generational Jump So Far'
00:47:34 - Out today
00:50:05 - “Who do you cast Charles Martinet as?” - triforcespower
00:54:54 - You‘re Wrong
Monday’s Hosts: Greg & Tim

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny
